item.title: 香港两周内第四次捍卫外汇挂钩政策
item.description: 香港当局在两周内第四次采取干预措施，以防止该市货币走软超过其官方交易范围，此前的努力未能抽走足够的流动性，从而推高了融资成本。【原文：Hong Kong authorities intervened for the fourth time in two weeks to prevent the city’s currency from weakening beyond its official trading band, after previous efforts failed to drain enough liquidity to push up funding costs.】

item.title: 优步的印度雄心面临竞争对手 Rapido 的最新挑战
item.description: 一家在印度以外鲜为人知的打车服务独角兽公司正以比优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：A ride-hailing unicorn little known outside of India is gaining users faster than Uber Technologies Inc., disrupting the San Francisco titan’s effort to conquer a key growth market.】

item.title: 法国总理敦促欧洲央行努力刺激经济增长
item.description: 法国总理弗朗索瓦-巴伊鲁（Francois Bayrou）呼吁欧洲中央银行采取更多措施支持经济，因为法国政府正在努力控制预算赤字并应对增长放缓问题。【原文：French Prime Minister Francois Bayrou called on the European Central Bank to do more to support the economy as his government struggles to contain its budget deficit and address slowing growth.】

item.title: 越南如何成为特朗普贸易战的目标
item.description:
中国作为制造业中心的崛起使其成为全球贸易的重要参与者，也是 "中国+1 "战略的主要受益者。【原文：

The country’s rise as a manufacturing hub has made it a key player in global trade, and a major beneficiary of the “China+1” strategy.

】

item.title: 他与宠物狗帕克一起，从家中引诱数十亿人投资于高风险的 ETF
item.description:
马修-塔特尔（Matthew Tuttle）是为新一代散户投资者提供高风险基金的新锐基金经理之一。【原文：

Matthew Tuttle is among upstart money managers serving up high-risk funds to a new generation of retail investors.

】

item.title: 佛罗里达州检察院调查 Robinhood 的加密货币交易促销活动
item.description: Robinhood Markets Inc. 的加密货币业务是佛罗里达州一项调查的对象，调查指控这家流行的金融科技平台在成本方面使用欺骗性做法误导消费者。【原文：Robinhood Markets Inc.’s cryptocurrency operations are the subject of an investigation in Florida, accusing the popular fintech platform of using deceptive practices to mislead consumers about costs.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔法院将就采矿业称妨碍钻探的费用作出裁决
item.description: 厄瓜多尔政府和刚刚起步的采矿业正在就上个月宣布的一项有争议的收费展开一场法律战。【原文：Ecuador’s government and its fledgling mining industry are heading into a legal battle over a controversial fee announced last month.】

item.title: 摩根大通的奥克萨娜-阿罗诺夫（Oksana Aronov）认为有更多的垃圾公司在偿还债务方面举步维艰
item.description: 摩根大通资产管理公司（JPMorgan Asset Management）的奥克萨娜-阿罗诺夫（Oksana Aronov）认为，随着利率居高不下和盈利下降，评级较低的公司用新债支付更多利息是信贷压力上升的一个迹象。【原文：Lower-rated companies paying more interest with new debt is a sign of rising credit stress as interest rates stay high and earnings decline, according to JPMorgan Asset Management’s Oksana Aronov.】

item.title: 达特茅斯大学出售 4.56 亿美元债券，加入常春藤联盟债券热潮
item.description: 达特茅斯学院正在寻求超过 4.5 亿美元的借款，加入了今年常春藤联盟发行人转向债务市场的大潮。【原文：Dartmouth College is looking to borrow more than $450 million, joining a groundswell of Ivy League issuers turning to the debt markets this year.】

item.title: 美国人工智能禁令失败，各州人工智能规则卷土重来
item.description: 人工智能监管在美国卷土重来。另外：埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在争议声中发布了功能更强大的新版 Grok。但首先...【原文：AI regulation is making a comeback in the US. Plus: Elon Musk unveils a more powerful new version of Grok amid controversy. But first…】

item.title: 马里直升机从巴里克巨型金矿缴获价值 1.17 亿美元的黄金
item.description: 据巴里克矿业公司称，马里政府的直升机周四意外降落在该公司的金矿，并没收了超过一吨的贵金属。【原文：Malian government helicopters landed unexpectedly at Barrick Mining Corp.’s gold mine on Thursday and seized more than a tonne of the precious metal, according to the company.】

item.title: 美联储主席戴利认为 2025 年将有两次减税，并称关税对价格的影响可能会减弱
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）表示，她仍然认为今年有可能降息两次，并认为关税对价格的影响可能比预期的要小。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco President Mary Daly said she still views two interest rate cuts as likely this year and sees a greater chance that the price effects from tariffs may be more muted than anticipated.】

item.title: 亚马逊 "Prime Day "现在还附带 "Boxpocalypse "活动
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 英伟达黄仁勋在首席执行官访华前会见特朗普
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.据熟悉内情的人士透露，Nvidia 公司首席执行官黄仁勋周四将在白宫会见美国总统唐纳德-特朗普，而此时距离这家全球最有价值芯片制造商的掌门人计划的中国之行还有几天时间。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang is meeting with US President Donald Trump at the White House on Thursday, days before a planned trip to China by the head of the world’s most valuable chipmaker, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 联合利华将委内瑞拉冰淇淋业务出售给卡车制造商 Mack
item.description: 联合利华集团将其委内瑞拉冰淇淋业务出售给汽车公司 Mack de Venezuela CA，因为高通胀和政治不确定性再次打击了这个安第斯国家的私营部门。【原文：Unilever Plc sold its Venezuelan ice cream business to automotive company Mack de Venezuela CA, as a renewed bout of high inflation and political uncertainty hits the Andean nation’s private sector.】

item.title: 苹果计划在 2026 年初推出新款 MacBook Pro、iPhone 17e 和 iPad
item.description: 苹果公司计划在 2026 年上半年发布一系列雄心勃勃的新产品，包括新款低端 iPhone、多款 iPad 和升级版 Mac。【原文：Apple Inc. is planning an ambitious pipeline of new products for release during the first half of 2026, including a new low-end iPhone, multiple iPads and upgraded Macs.】

item.title: Spotify 强化人工策划，进军阿尔驱动的播放列表领域
item.description:
这家流媒体巨头最近将其编辑团队推到了公众面前，尽管此前他们一直被禁止出现在聚光灯下

。【原文：

The streaming giant has recently put its editorial team in the public eye despite previously barring them from the spotlight

】

item.title: 墨西哥银行家在美国洗钱闪电战中表现勇敢
item.description: 每隔一个月，墨西哥的银行家们就会聚集在首都殖民地中心的一座宫殿式掩体中，一起用餐并会见高级官员。【原文：Every other month, Mexico’s bankers gather in a palatial bunker in the colonial center of the capital to dine together and meet with top officials.】

item.title: 破产的创世纪医疗保健公司获得 ReGen 收购要约
item.description: 根据周四提交的法庭文件，美国最大的养老院运营商之一创世纪医疗保健公司（Genesis Healthcare Inc.【原文：Genesis Healthcare Inc., one of the largest nursing home operators in the US, has filed bankruptcy and struck an initial deal to be acquired by affiliates of ReGen Healthcare LLC, according to court papers filed Thursday.】

item.title: 参议院确认乔纳森-古尔德为货币监理专员
item.description: 美国参议院确认乔纳森-古尔德（Jonathan Gould）将领导货币监理署（Office of the Comptroller of the Currency），这使他成为特朗普政府官员中的一员，这些官员倾向于放宽对国家贷款机构的监管，并支持加密资产。【原文：The US Senate confirmed Jonathan Gould to lead the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency, adding him to the roster of Trump administration officials who favor lighter regulation of the nation’s lenders and an embrace of crypto assets.】

item.title: Robinhood 首席执行官的人工智能数学初创公司估值近 9 亿美元
item.description: Harmonic AI 是一家人工智能初创公司，由 Robinhood Markets Inc.首席执行官弗拉德-特涅夫（Vlad Tenev）共同创立的人工智能初创公司 Harmonic AI 已筹集到 1 亿美元资金，以解决有时令人工智能模型感到困惑的问题：数学。【原文：Harmonic AI, an artificial intelligence startup co-founded by Robinhood Markets Inc. Chief Executive Officer Vlad Tenev, has raised $100 million in funding to tackle a problem that has sometimes confounded AI models: math.】

item.title: 加密货币诈骗犯特鲁利亚被判入狱 12 年，刑期从 18 个月延长至 12 年
item.description: 一名男子原本因参与盗窃 2200 万美元加密货币的计划而被判入狱 18 个月，但因未能偿还受害者的钱财而被大幅加刑至 12 年。【原文：A man who originally got 18 months in prison for his part in a scheme to steal $22 million in cryptocurrency, saw his sentence increase dramatically to 12 years after failing to pay back his victim.】

item.title: 美联储就修订银行监管评级计划征求意见
item.description: 美联储表示，将就改变大银行监管评级框架的建议征求意见。【原文：The Federal Reserve said it will seek comment on a proposal to change its supervisory rating framework for big banks.】

item.title: Citadel Securities 收购摩根士丹利期权做市商
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Citadel Securities 收购了摩根士丹利专注于美国股票期权电子做市的部门，从而扩大了摩根士丹利在这一流行衍生品领域已经占据的主导地位。【原文：Citadel Securities bought Morgan Stanley’s unit focused on electronic market-making for US equity options, expanding the firm’s already dominant role in the popular derivatives, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Indeed和Glassdoor将在以人工智能为重点的整合中裁员1300人
item.description: Indeed和Glassdoor均为日本集团Recruit Holdings Co.所有，这两家公司将裁员约1300人，作为合并业务和将更多精力转向人工智能的更广泛举措的一部分。【原文：Indeed and Glassdoor — both owned by the Japanese group Recruit Holdings Co. — are cutting roughly 1,300 jobs as part of a broader move to combine operations and shift more focus toward artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 市场轮动让 S&P 500 指数跌者更跌，赢者更赢
item.description: 美国股市在 7 月份发生了明显的变化：一些上半年表现最差的股票现在表现出色，而年初的赢家则逐渐失宠。【原文：A noticeable shift has been reshaping US equities in the month of July: Some of the biggest laggards from the first half are now outperforming, while the year’s early winners are falling out of favor.】

item.title: 比特币延续创纪录涨势，期权交易商目标 12 万美元
item.description: 比特币期权交易商已经把目光投向了更高的价格，而原始加密货币已经连续第二天延续了破纪录的涨势。【原文：Bitcoin options traders are already setting their sights on much higher prices while the original cryptocurrency extends its record-breaking rally for a second day.】

item.title: 特朗普对巴西征收关税有可能破坏从咖啡到牛肉的贸易
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统出人意料地威胁要对巴西征收 50%的关税，这一举动可能会扰乱全球大宗商品市场，破坏从牛肉到咖啡等各种商品的贸易。【原文：President Donald Trump’s unexpected move to threaten a 50% tariff on Brazil risks roiling global commodity markets, disrupting trade on everything from beef to coffee.】

item.title: 美联储主席沃勒支持资产负债表清算和结构调整
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）表示，美国央行应能将银行储备水平从目前的 3.26 万亿美元降至 2.7 万亿美元左右。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said the US central bank should be able to lower the level of bank reserves to around $2.7 trillion, from the current level of $3.26 trillion.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利筹划 BetaNXT 私人债务再融资交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）正在为软件平台 BetaNXT 公司的 9.5 亿美元债务再融资杠杆贷款向投资者征询意见，这是私人信贷和广泛银团市场之间活动转移的最新例证。【原文：Morgan Stanley is sounding out investors for $950 million of leveraged loans to refinance software platform BetaNXT Inc.’s debt, according to people familiar with the matter, the latest example of activity shifting between private credit and the broadly syndicated market.】
